title: A 16 perches land aside in Diyatalawa main road is for sale
details:
A 16 Perches land aside in Colombo Badulla main road in Diyatalawa town is for sale.

* Located in an invaluable place in Diyatalawa town
* Located aside in Colombo Badulla main road in Diyatalawa town
* A place next to the Sri Lankan Government's Holiday Bungalow
* Located near the Diyatalawa Railway Station
* Located in a place with a scenic beauty of Diyatalawa
* Most suitable for a businessmen
* A perfect location for a Hotel/ Guest house or a Residence.
